s.text: The sophisticated spin: Black, mixed-race, and second-generation French players (led by Zidane, the Muslim son of Algerian immigrants) beat the team that had been embraced, overhyped, and overcommercialized by the global sports media and business elite.
6) After the story collapsed, "I was basically told to be a good team player and not say anything."

The sophisticated spin: Black, mixed-race, and second-generation French players (led by Zidane, the Muslim son of Algerian immigrants) beat the team that had been embraced, overhyped, and overcommercialized by the global sports media and business elite.
4) "I was never informed that my face on the air gave me responsibility for a major story."
The negative spin: Rich kids get off easy because they can afford good lawyers who know how to plea-bargain.
2) It's standard practice for producers to enlist correspondents such as him to ask scripted questions on camera without having done the preparatory work.
